tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (DT The) (JJ awkward) (NN moment)) (SBAR (WHADVP (WRB when)) (S (NP (NP (NN someone)) (SBAR (S (NP (PRP you)) (VP (VBP hate))))) (VP (VBZ thinks) (NP (PRP$ their) (NN opinion)))))) (VP (VBZ is) (NP (JJ valid) (NN :@)))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [:@/NN nsubj>[moment/NN det>The/DT amod>awkward/JJ acl:relcl>[thinks/VBZ advmod>when/WRB nsubj>[someone/NN acl:relcl>[hate/VBP nsubj>you/PRP]] dobj>[opinion/NN nmod:poss>their/PRP$]]] cop>is/VBZ amod>valid/JJ]
